verses.roman:
advaita ācārya--prabhura aṁśa-avatāra
tāṅra pāda-padme koṭi praṇati āmāra

synonyms: advaita ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; prabhura—of the Supreme Lord; aṁśa—partial; avatāra—incarnation; tāṅra—of Him; pāda-padme—unto the lotus feet; koṭi—ten million; praṇati—respectful obeisances; āmāra—my.
translation: Advaita Ācārya is the Lord's partial incarnation, and therefore I offer my obeisances millions of times at His lotus feet.
